    • Method Detail

      • split

        public static List split(Data data,
         String expression)
                  throws CiliaException
        Split a given org.ow2.chameleon.cilia.Data using a given XPath expression. The given data must have as content an Xml in a form of string.
        Parameters:
        data - The Data to split.
        expression - The expression to use to split Node.
        Returns:
        a List of org.w3c.dom.Node objects
        Throws:
        CiliaException - When there is an error building the Xml parser or when there is a problem parsing the Node

      • split

        public static List split(Data data,
         String expression,
         boolean addSplitInfo)
                  throws CiliaException
        Throws:
        CiliaException

      • split

        public static List split(Node node,
         String expression)
                  throws CiliaException
        Split a given org.w3c.dom.Node using a given XPath expression.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to split.
        expression - The expression to use to split Node.
        Returns:
        a List of org.w3c.dom.Node objects
        Throws:
        CiliaException - When there is an error building the Xml parser or when there is a problem parsing the Node
